about_the_game:
Welcome to Freeforce Airplanes, a unique game that combines high-speed air races and exciting aerial battles! You will have to choose from 10 unique airplanes, each with its own characteristics and style. Customize your plane by choosing from a variety of skins and go to 8 amazing locations, from tropical islands to futuristic megacities.

The game is not only about racing, but also about real air battles! Use your weapons to shoot down your opponents on the fly, make your way to victory and avoid the attacks of your opponents. Want to compete with your friends? Connect to local multiplayer and play together on the same device!

Challenging opponents, dynamic gameplay and the ability to destroy enemies in the air make Freeforce Airplanes an unforgettable experience!

Game Features:

- 10 unique airplanes: each plane has its own characteristics and control style.

Customization: plenty of skins to personalize your aircraft.

- 8 exciting locations: from snowy mountains to desert plains and megacities.

- Local multiplayer: play two players on the same device and find out who is the best pilot.

- Air battles: destroy enemies in a race using weapons and maneuverability.

- Challenging opponents: artificial intelligence adapts to your play style, making each race unique.

- Dynamic gameplay: high speed, maneuvers and plenty of action moments.

name: Freeforce Airplanes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 6GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Freeforce Airplanes is a dynamic air racing game where you control airplanes, fight with opponents and strive for victory at incredible speeds. Choose from 10 unique planes, customize them with a variety of skins and conquer 8 exciting locations!
